com.hert.legacyofat.game

Class GameMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hert.legacyofat.game.GameMaster

  • public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the game related events, such as advancing a turn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameMaster

        public GameMaster(GameListener parent,
                  int team,
                  org.json.JSONObject json)
        Instantiates a new Game master.

        Copies all the selected characters into the variables here and sets them up.

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent (battle activity)
        team - the selected team of user
        json - the json enemy data

    • Method Detail

      • advance

        public void advance()
        Advances the turn.

        First it sorts all characters based on their speed + some randomness Then it will iterate over the sorted list (fastest character first) and performs their action on the its selected targets.

      • checkStatuses

        public void checkStatuses()
        Checks statuses of all charas, whether theyre dead or not and whether the game is over now or not.

        public int getSelectedTarget(int selectedChara)
